org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers

Interface IQueryAtom

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, IAtom, IAtomType, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IElement, IIsotope
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AliphaticAtom, AliphaticSymbolAtom, AnyAtom, AromaticAtom, AromaticSymbolAtom, AtomicNumberAtom, ChiralityAtom, ConnectionCountAtom, DegreeAtom, ExplicitConnectionAtom, FormalChargeAtom, HybridizationNumberAtom, HydrogenAtom, ImplicitHCountAtom, InverseSymbolSetQueryAtom, LogicalOperatorAtom, MassAtom, NonCHHeavyAtom, PeriodicGroupNumberAtom, PharmacophoreQueryAtom, RecursiveSmartsAtom, RingAtom, RingIdentifierAtom, RingMembershipAtom, SmallestRingAtom, SMARTSAtom, SymbolAndChargeQueryAtom, SymbolChargeIDQueryAtom, SymbolQueryAtom, SymbolSetQueryAtom, TotalConnectionAtom, TotalHCountAtom, TotalRingConnectionAtom, TotalValencyAtom

    public interface IQueryAtom
extends IAtom
    Defines the ability to be matched against IAtom's. Most prominent application is in isomorphism and substructure matching in the UniversalIsomorphismTester.
    See Also:
    UniversalIsomorphismTester
    Belongs to CDK module:
    interfaces
    Source code:
    HEAD

      • matches

        boolean matches(IAtom atom)
        Returns true of the given atom matches this IQueryAtom.
        Parameters:
        atom - IAtom to match against
        Returns:
        true, if this IQueryAtom matches the given IAtom
